infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Wingman uses your location to detect your current airport during a layover so you can connect with other travelers nearby, join or create local events, and discover people with similar interests.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Wingman allows you to upload a profile photo or share pictures with fellow travelers during layovers.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Wingman sends you notifications about new messages, events, and updates during your layover.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Wingman uses Face ID to securely authenticate admin access to protect sensitive administrative features.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Wingman uses your location to detect your current airport during a layover so you can connect with other travelers nearby, join or create local events, and discover people with similar interests.

plugins.photosPermission: Wingman allows you to upload a profile photo or share pictures with fellow travelers during layovers.
plugins.cameraPermission: Wingman allows you to upload a profile photo or share pictures with fellow travelers during layovers.
